name: Rwanda
footnote: Projection from 2023 EICV7 using average elasticity (2010-2016) with pass-through = 0.87 based on real HFCE per capita. Rwanda’s consumption aggregate and poverty measurement based on EICV7 (2023/24) incorporated several methodological changes to the design of the consumption survey to align with evolving international best practices. To enable trend analysis, NISR imputed 2016/17 consumption under EICV7 protocols and assessed it against the EICV7 poverty line. As a result, poverty estimates from EICV7 are not directly comparable with those from earlier rounds, thus leading to a break in the international poverty rate series.
